concept.title: Create 3D Meshes
concept.shortdesc: The 3D command is widely used for creating objects as boxes, cones, dishes, meshes, pyramids, spheres, donuts, and wedges. Before hiding 3D entities, all the meshes are displayed in wireframe.

conbody.p: Use VPOINT to view the entity once you have created a 3D entity, or performed View-3D Orbit from View menu options to view the 3D entity in full perspective. The following picture displays entities as meshes with specified vertexes.
